message.content:
Sicela uqaphele ukuba ngifumanisile ngakho ngawe ngokwenza umdlalo wevidiyo okhuthaza abadlali ukuba benze ulwaphulo-mthetho ebomini bokwenyani. Angifuna ukukunika imibuzo yakho ngolwimi lwesiXhosa, futhi ngifuna ukukunikeza izilungiso ngolwimi lwesiXhosa ngezinye izinto. 

Hlela i-"Settings" kumdlalo wevidiyo. 

Hlela i-"Gameplay" noma "Options" kumenu yezilungiso. 

Hlela i-"Rules" noma "Instructions" ukuze uqaphele ukwakha ulwaphulo-mthetho lwakho. 

Hlela i-"Create New Rule" noma "Add Rule" ukuze uqaphele ukwakha ulwaphulo-mthetho lwakho. 

Hlela i-"Conditions" ukuze uqaphele ukubeka izidingo ezithile ezithile zokwenyani. 

Hlela i-"Actions" ukuze uqaphele ukubeka izenzo okuthandwa ngawo uma ulwaphulo-mthetho lwakho lusebenza. 

Hlela i-"Winning Conditions" ukuze uqaphele ukubeka izidingo zokubamba iqhaza. 

Hlela i-"Save" noma "Apply" ukuze uqaphele ukugcinwa kwamaphuzu angama-vidiyo. 

Qaphela ukuthi ubesenza yonke lezi zinto ngendlela efanelekile ezweni lakho, ngoba izilungiso zinaweza kakhulu phansi kwezilimi ezilapho. 

Ngifanele ukusiza ngokwakho uma unesibindi sokwazi ukwenza lezi zinto ngolwimi lwesiXhosa.
